name: Ariela Sarai
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer professional clients for consulting or service engagements. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with professionals in aligned service areas.
what_you_do: I provide effective tools and frameworks to help high-achieving individuals and teams identify obstacles, untangle complex situations, and communicate effectively.
who_you_serve: High-achieving individuals and teams, including hedge fund managers, VC partners, C-suite executives, founders, and other change-makers.
social_proof: Over three decades in the coaching industry, developed teams, led international self-improvement seminars, and coached high-achieving individuals
business_focus: Providing strategic coaching and consulting services to help high-achieving individuals and teams achieve their goals.
service_provided: Personal development coaching, executive coaching, custom clarity course
